short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows upcoming WCA competitions by country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WCA Competitions Tracker is the ultimate tool for speedcubers to stay updated with upcoming competitions around the world. With a simple and intuitive interface, this extension allows you to:

- Browse upcoming WCA competitions by country.
- Easily plan and track competitions in your region or abroad and register.
-Stay ahead by getting quick access to event details like location, dates, and more.
Whether you're a seasoned competitor or a cubing enthusiast, WCA Competitions Tracker ensures you never miss a chance to participate or spectate in your favorite competitions!
